frontmatter.title: Speaking Skills MCQs With Answers

pageProps.content:
1. Which of these factors is not involved in the determination of correct tone?

    2. a) Pitch
    b) Dressing style
    c) Quality
    d) Strength

    b) Dressing style

  2. (a)
    (b)
    (c)
    (d)

  3. (a)
    (b)
    (c)
    (d)

  4. (a)
    (b)
    (c)
    (d)
